title: GPAI â€” Suite & Platform of GP Tools, Datasets & Models
blurb: Ecosystem for GP: curated datasets, synthetic data pipelines, evaluation harnesses, safety packs, and fine-tuned model artifacts.
description: GPAI is the foundation layer for GP deployments. It standardizes dataset schemas and manifests, provides builders for curated/synthetic corpora, ships evaluation benches (tools/RAG/safety), and maintains fine-tuned models and adapters with full training metadata for reproducibility. Targets local-first deployments with quantized variants, and supports cloud/hybrid inference adapters.
